did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Charles Lewis Bowman photographs and drawings, 1917-1962.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Photographs and architectural drawings of houses designed or altered by Charles Lewis Bowman.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Charles Lewis Bowman was an architect who designed many homes in Bronxville, New York and elsewhere.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Photographs and architectural drawings of houses designed or altered by Charles Lewis Bowman.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Charles Lewis Bowman photographs and drawings, #3807. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Series I. Photographs

scopecontent.p: Photographs of houses designed or altered by Lewis Bowman; the photographs are mainly the work of John Wallace Gillies ca. 1885-1927.
